resources.string: Sorry, we could not find that movie. You may need to reload movie data if you haven\'t in a while.
Load the next %1$d months of movies
Calendar to use for quick reminders
Remind me %1$d days before the release date
Remind me %1$d day before the release date
We\'re sorry, we did not find any Google Calendars which you have permission to edit. Please create one to be able to save reminders from this app.
We could not download upcoming data because there was no connection to the internet. Please connect and try again.
What type of reminder would you like to set?
This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb. Any questions or inquiries can be directed to nyelitodev@gmail.com

Simply start typing the movie name, then select it from the dropdown, and hit "Remind Me". 

This will set a reminder on your selected calendar for the number of days you have selected in settings before the release date. 

If the movie is not in the list, try loading more months from the settings.

Browse for movies from the upcoming months you have loaded. 

Click on a movie to either set a quick reminder or a customizable reminder.
With any questions or problems, please contact the developer here: nyelitodev@gmail.com
You have already removed ads, if they are still showing, please contact the developer
